dict.acceptation: 南方的，南部的；来自南方的；

sent.orig: Southern analysis indicated that NTL gene was present as a single copy in this M.anisopliae strain.
sent.trans: Southern杂交表明，NTL基因在CQMa102基因组中为单拷贝。

sent.orig: Southern hospitality; southern cooking; southern plantations.
sent.trans: 南方的好客；南方烹饪；南方种植园。

sent.orig: The phenomenon is called lights in the Northern Hemisphere and southern lights in Southern Hemisphere.
sent.trans: 这种现象在北半球称作为北极光，而在南半球则叫南极光。

sent.orig: Southerns threaten Southerners threatened to leaving leave the union Union unless southern southern rights were protected.
sent.trans: 南方则威胁说如果南方权利得不到保护的话将脱离联邦。

sent.orig: And there are increasing reports from South America as well as from other Southern southern countries.
sent.trans: 另外，在南美和其他南部国家也有持续增长的病例报道。
